description: When a Spanish Aristocrat’s daughter became a Playboy model we were sure it was a scandal, but now that she is in the USA and all tied up with a huge cock down her throat, she’s probably been disinherited. Master Ben English takes his sex slave from the trunk he stores her in and immediately punishes her for being a whore. Two-toned hair and red fingernails do not lie - this princess from Spain is now just a porn valley slut that must be disciplined. Spanking, strict rope bondage, flogging, and a lesson in humility put sexy blonde Bridgette B in her place and prepared to be fucked while all control is taken from her. When the Master is done with her, Bridgette is placed back in her trunk with cum on her face and her hands tied behind her back.
title: Master English Disciplines His Whore
